snippet: Citing better productivity, some companies are trying to wean employees from constant contact with their electronic devices.
abstract: Some companies are adopting policies aimed at weaning employees from their smartphones and other electronic devices; move is aimed at improving productivity during work day by encouraging employees to disconnect during off hours.
lead_paragraph: Citing better productivity, some companies are trying to wean employees from constant contact with their electronic devices.

headline.seo: Some Companies Seek to Wean Employees From Their Smartphones
